name: Super Slice Pro
description:
Slice with skill to complete over 72 physics levels of Super Slice and become a slice Legend.

Super Slice (Pro) is new puzzle game, just slice with your super sharp finger and enjoy the game. Every Level has different slicing polygon objects and goals. You might have slice words or slice ice or slice board or slice the cheese or fruit slice, now try slicing the newest physics gem objects. Moreover black objects does not slice or slash or clef or corte. There has never been a better time to play with fresh new concept of polygon slicing, so sharp it and see what’s new in the game that started it all. This is still just the beginning – we can’t wait for everyone to join us!

If you enjoy playing mind or brain or concept or innovative puzzle games then you will love this game.

Game Features:

◉ Over 72 Levels
◉ Insane real-time physics
◉ Addictive game play
◉ Puzzles, action and more

If you have enjoyed the game, please do share the game with your friends and family. We will bring more challenging levels soon! Don’t forget to share your breaker score and compete with different players around the world.

Thank you very much for playing Super Slice! Please do write your review on the play store!
